events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not as described and I want to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason for requesting the refund in more detail?
The order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and does not work as advertised, so I would like my money back.
We will initiate a full refund once you return the faulty product. I will send you the return shipping label right away.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will send the product back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer expressed satisfaction.
